website_summaries.verdict: A very good entry-level dSLR, the Nikon D3100 delivers excellent photo quality in a body that's streamlined for experienced photographers, but relatively unintimidating for the less advanced. Its only weakness is performance; though solid, it nevertheless lags behind the competition.
pros: full manual controls in video capture

customer_reviews.title: ... went black after 2 years and that was pure disappointment. Didn't want to spend $600-700 again so settled ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a D5000 but screen went black after 2 years and that was pure disappointment . Didn't want to spend $600-700 again so settled for a cheaper model since this has lots less options . But I never used all the options on the D5000 anyway and the D3100 has plenty options to take very nice pictures . Lens, battery and accessories were interchangeable so this helped a lot . Pictures still turn out beautiful since the same lens is being used . If your not a professional photographer then this works great without the extra expense .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sako

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my D60. I really wanted the D5100 but couldn't afford it. It has all of the basic features I wanted but is missing the additional resolution of the D5100, 14.2 Meg vs 16.2 meg, and the adjustable screen which is OK. The most important thing to me is that it uses all of my lenses and attachments I had for the D60 and uses them as well or better than the D60. It's a very nice camera. It takes very nice HD video. It is limited to 10 minutes but when you think about it thats a pretty long video. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: RLJones

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement For D70
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a Nikon D70 that finally quit working. It was actually a gift replacement which was for my grandson. He loves the camera and it works with his lenses. He particularly likes the movie capabilities and we just returned from a winter photo trip to Yellowstone where it performed quite well. We just wish that it had exposure bracketing capabilities for high dynamic range scenes. Other than that, it works quite well and it was a great price as a used camera purchase from an Amazon Merchant.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stick With What You Know
customer_reviews.text: I had fallen in love with my D3100 and about the time my grandson arrived, my camera died. I thought about upgrading, but finally decided that I really didn't want any more bells and whistles. I loved the D3100, so why not stick with what I know? Haven't used it a lot, but brought it along on a visit to Medieval Times. The show was spectacular, but not terribly camera friendly. Even so, got some pretty good shots. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from D70s
customer_reviews.text: We've been using a D70s since it came out for our DSLR action and it was time to upgrade. The D3100 is a great body; unfortunately one lens I have the Nikkor 50mm F/1.8 AF lens does not autofocus since this body needs the AF-S lenses but otherwise our existing investment in glass is preserved. The unit is smaller and lighter than the D70s was and the improved picture quality is very noticeable. The Ken Rockwell site still recommends this model unless you're a professional, I'm glad I followed his recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grier

customer_reviews.title: No battery, no charger, no SD card, beat up.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packaged and although it said it came with a battery & charger, mine did not come with either one. I was at least expecting a battery in there. Scratched up. I don't know if it's from being used or from how poorly packaged it was lol. I should expect that with free shipping, though. It has no SD card, but that's cool. Obviously it came with no lens, I knew that before I purchased. It looks pretty beat and used up. At least it came with a strap though lmao I feel like I got what I paid for though not gonna lie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable. Resilient. Functional.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first d/SLR. So far, I've been very happy with my photographic results. The on-board RAW editing and video trimming reduce the amount of housekeeping I'd normally do in post on a desktop. WB is the only feature I have set to Auto and it's very accurate in most scenarios. I really have only two complaints: 1.) No manual mode for video (although, you can use a flashlight to adjust the exposure and then lock it.) 2.) The LCD screen lights up when I'm adjusting exposure in the viewfinder's HUD. Also, I feel it worthy to mention that this camera has survived outdoor shoots in torrential rain.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: great resolution for atleast up to 8x10 prints realy good colors and tones. cant crop quite as mutch as the d3400 but close. for regular photography its not eaven noticable. got it used and it looks and functions like new.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D3100
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to see the excellent packaging job . It was in mint condition very clean excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nikon upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews. With all I read I finally settled on this camera doing the best for me. I have had it a couple of weeks now and I love it. I would rather have a camera body that has an auto focus motor, but my lenses both have it, so all works perfect for me. Maybe down the road I will upgrade this one too. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good: Live View a welcome addition HD video capture Great sensor and processor Robust build Decent value for money Bad: Not quite pro-standard build quality
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon D3100 is a great camera for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D3100, cannot recommend enough
customer_reviews.text: I own a Sony point and shoot and a Nikon D600, but for the best combination of lightness for travel, image quality and ease of use, the Nikon D3100 is the winner. As an intermediate photographer, I avoided it because I thought it was for beginners. I was wrong. Highly recommend to anyone who wants SLR quality in a small camera body. I take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Knight

customer_reviews.title: grey market item!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long-time Nikon user. This is a great camera for the price. Very pleased with the product. But once I examined the documentation, it's apparent it is in fact a grey market product. Disappointed in Amazon for not disclosing this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wotschak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera for a beginner price and shipping were top notch
customer_reviews.author: DWS

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera ,easy to use, almost brand new , use it as a second camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gray market camera, which is not disclosed in item description. Mine was Chinese market. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade from my old DSLR - everything I need while I have a real job.
customer_reviews.text: This is a big step up from the D50 I had before. Glad that I decided to purchase this rather than replacing the battery in the old one.
customer_reviews.author: jaxmandue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my camera! =) I've had it for a couple months now and have used it a lot. I'm not a professional photographer or even know much about it...but I know, to use it to it's full potential I should probably learn more about it, because I'm sure I would love my camera even more. But even just for a simple point and shoot and using autofocus while doing that...it takes beautiful beautiful pictures!!! I love going on roadtrips and taking pictures and making scrapbooks...and this camera has made my pictures so much better looking, even without me knowing anything about photography!
customer_reviews.author: TammyGermanGirl

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, super lightweight even with a lens attached. Really awesome quality, came with a battery already charged up and that one charge has lasted me a month or even a little more!
customer_reviews.author: laillama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Semi-Professional Camera
customer_reviews.text: While the stock lens that comes with the D3100 kit is great, I preferred a faster 2.8 lens. I purchased the body alone and then purchased two lenses separately. As far as the camera, it is the perfect mid-point camera for someone who wants to step up their photography but doesn't want to to spend thousands of dollars. Combined with Lightroom 4, I get really great results. People think I have a super expensive professional camera... but it's just Nikon's entry-level DSLR. If you know what you are doing, you can really get a lot out of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: All very well, my expectations have been heaping too ...
customer_reviews.text: All very well, my expectations have been heaping too much: I bought a used camera but she looks new. And I have in my country (Argentina) and I've been using in my party GOLDEN JUBILEE. Thank you very much for your services that I will use.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alberto Marchetti

customer_reviews.title: great camera in a good price
customer_reviews.text: it is an awesome product, it has a great price and quality, perfectly for what I was looking
customer_reviews.author: Caminante583

customer_reviews.title: Love the upgrade from the d3000
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty fast and have already used it a lot! Love it. I upgraded from my damaged D3000 so I am still learning the new gagets.
customer_reviews.author: sadubay

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff
customer_reviews.text: Came with wrong wire that connected to computer. Did not have the battery lock in. packaged nicely though.. Had a funny smell on it (maybe it's just me)
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Communication/Very Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I just received this camera body. I do know this is a great one. I have not used it yet,however,I am confident that I will not have a problem. Again, I would definitely buy from this seller again. i need to add in that the price was quite reasonable
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seller! I paid for my camera and he shipped it out immediately. It came to me exactly how it was described.
customer_reviews.author: Flor Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my D40x
customer_reviews.text: The shutter froze in my D40x and I don't live near a camera repair shop, the cost of shipping it to one, paying a minimum of $130 to have it looked at and maybe repaired and having tho pay shipping to get it back made me look for a new camera body that would fit my lenses. This was the ticket and I got a body with 14 Mp vs 10 on my old camera, plus a movie mode, it has an instructional guide in the camera which is very helpful, so it was a nice step up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, very quick delivery, everything was included and in perfect working order. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: t.gggggggg

customer_reviews.title: ... been interrupted it happens every time and its getting annoying
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand i try to record videos but after about a minute it stops and says recording has been interrupted it happens every time and its getting annoying
customer_reviews.author: izzie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day before estimated, everything is here, and it's in great condition! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: A nice camera body for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera body at a nice price. I bought it so that we could have both a wide angle and a telephoto lens on vacation without having to switch out lenses all the time (we already had the lenses and didn't need a camera with a lens). Works beautifully for that, easy to use and very compact. My husband, who has the D50, grabs it every chance he gets.
customer_reviews.author: Rappers Mom

customer_reviews.title: I bought another D3100 because the price/value factor is excellent considering that i make money with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera and after 70.000 shots the Shutter button began to fail, giving fuzzy images. I bought another D3100 because the price/value factor is excellent considering that i make money with this stuff. If you want to see the image quality of this camera, follow me ------> Instagram: @berniemelof
customer_reviews.author: B. Melo

customer_reviews.title: cheapest nikon model that has video. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: upgraded from the D3000 which didn't have video. This is the best cheap way to take video, combined with a zoom lens, it's great. I have no idea what anyone would do with the more expensive models if they are an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii T

customer_reviews.title: Feature rich
customer_reviews.text: I went from a D40 to the D3100 ...and it was like a caveman in Star Trek. This camera can do so much for me. Instead of having to spend a lot of time setting this and that, I can concentrate on the composition of the photo. I really like that. Love my Nikon!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Violette

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It delivers a great product either mode you pick, fast or slow! Great for the amateur as well as professional!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: battery door
customer_reviews.text: The battery door comes open sometimes. & i have to keep it closed with my finger. But overall is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Cable

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera works in all types of conditions very good starter for a beginner photographer, I would definitely recommend getting the 18-105 lens rather than the kit lens that comes in the kit package.
customer_reviews.author: Gearold McCoy

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded from a D40 and I must say I'm very happy! I don't use the video feature or live view but it's nice to have if I may ever need to do some spirit of the moment filming. This DSLR is excellent and I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Being an architectural designer and real estate ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Being an architectural designer and real estate agent, I wanted to present my seller's properties the best way I could without having to hire a professional photographer all the time. So I purchased this simple body and a wide-angle (10-20mm) Sigma lens. It's a great combo, totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana P. Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Nikon makes a good camera. The metering system is spot on.. my only complaint is that it focuses too slow.. Action photos of a dog jumping for his ball were very difficult to get.
customer_reviews.author: Seann

customer_reviews.title: A great starter DSLR.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in very good condition. Great price for this entry level DSLR. It's small and light, perfect for daypacking.
customer_reviews.author: HarloweThrombey

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: A good little DSLR. Got it for my daughter to shoot snapshots and to use for school projects. Not a lot of features, but does the job for the not as serious photographer who likes good images.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Steve Clark

customer_reviews.title: great camera for beginner
customer_reviews.text: got this for my aunt. it's light weight, and easty to use. great image quality when shoot at low iso.
customer_reviews.author: D. N.

customer_reviews.title: Very good item
customer_reviews.text: Item well packed and protected, almost new. It has been working great since I bought it. It is a fine model, easy to work with for amateurs and professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Berrios

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome!!! Especially good as a body only deal for those of you with vintage lenses from your film days.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda West

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera to introduce photographers to the advantages of SLR ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera to introduce photographers to the advantages of SLR camera upgrades. The one I got for my son was as if brand new and for about 175$ for the body this was a great bargain; perfect for the used( and also like new) Tamron 18-250 extreme zoom lens.
customer_reviews.author: James B.Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product ....
customer_reviews.text: Never regret buying this camera body..... Thanks a lot ......
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter Nikon camera. Have taken lot of photos. Easy to use and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy L Ledford Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works, still learning how to use it
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working good. Still not a pro but if i have enough tome to set it up i usually end up taking good picture. Definitely not a point and shoot kinda thing but it gets the right shot when configured correctly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Does the job. Very light, not bulky as some of the others.
customer_reviews.author: ronald

customer_reviews.title: The fastest shipment I've ever had since I started on ...
customer_reviews.text: The fastest shipment I've ever had since I started on line shoping long time ago, shipment exactly how its described
customer_reviews.author: zaid

customer_reviews.title: Nikok 3100
customer_reviews.text: As an entry level SLR, I find it to be very satisfactory...I feel it could be a little faster when it comes to storing a slow shutter speed shot...it seem to take longer than the time the shutter was open to store the pic...
customer_reviews.author: Rustyduck

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase and will surely do business here ...
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and perfectly packaged Nikon camera. Arrived quickly and I have been using it non stop. Very happy with this purchase and will surely do business here again. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: No Auto focus
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I received the camera but after I installed my lense found out that the auto focus didn't work. I tried another of my lenses and the same!!! I went to a store to check on a new lenses and guess what! It didn't work either!!! So the Autofocus mechanism from the camera was not check properly!!! It wasn't working...To bad I had to sent it back, I really liked it..,
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package received looks like it was previously opened, no warranty, no manual included.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Accessories from D3000 don't fit this - beware
customer_reviews.text: I only needed a new body and had lenses, batteries and chargers for the D3000. The lenses fit but don't seem to work on auto focus. The batteries and charger were not compatible, so I had to purchase these too. Had I known about all of this I would have purchased a package deal of a new D3000 for nearly the same price I paid for this. Also had to buy a manual to try to learn how to use it. It is quite different from the D3000.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They quality of the camera was not as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They quality of the camera was not as good as advertised. When asked to be returned they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good value since newer units have come out
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2nd D3100 as a back-up. Don't need anything more than this and already familiar with the unit. Good value since newer units have come out.
customer_reviews.author: RockinR

customer_reviews.title: not as big a savings as you think
customer_reviews.text: So, no frills just bubble wrapped body, no manual, no box, no battery, memory card info or suggestions. I thought I was saving but the extra research time & battery/memory card I wish I just got a kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Henderson

customer_reviews.title: damaged article
customer_reviews.text: damaged product. not get the battery. output spring damaged battery. I have to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Johelis Naharay Valero

customer_reviews.title: Great product definetly recommend as a starter camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera came in great condition and didn't have any severe scratches button labels were slightly faded but nothing noticeable the camera worked and felt like brand new. I myself just started photography and the camera was super easy to use for not bad of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Riscoe

product_meta.title: Nikon D3100 Digital SLR Camera Body (Kit Box) No Lens Included - International Version (No Warranty)
product_meta.description: Nikon D3100 Digital SLR Camera Body (Kit Box) No Lens Included
feature_bullets: Megapixels: 14.2 MegapixelsSensor Type: CMOS Sensor Zoom: 11.0 X Optical Camera Features: Automatic Image Sensor Cleaning, Full Manual Operation, Vibration Reduction Technology, 1080p HD Movie Recording, Live View, Auto Scene SelectorFlash Features: Slow-Sync Flash, Flash Cancel, Auto On/Off, Rear-Curtain Sync, Pop-Up Flash, Red-Eye Reduction, Fill-In Flash Display Size: 3.0 "ISO Equivalent: 100 - 3200Battery Required, included: 1 lithium ion non-universal Weight: 16.0 Oz.Warranty: 1 Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty
